# M5Stack Tab5 LVGL Operating System

## Project Overview
A comprehensive operating system for the M5Stack Tab5 device built on ESP32-P4 with LVGL GUI framework, featuring extensive application suite and accessibility features.

## Architecture
- **Hardware**: ESP32-P4 with 32MB PSRAM, 16MB Flash, USB OTG, dual microphones, camera support, BMI270 6-axis IMU
- **Framework**: Arduino + LVGL 8.4
- **Display**: High-resolution 1280×720 with 60Hz refresh rate capability and PPA acceleration
- **Audio**: Dual microphone support with PDM interface
- **Motion Detection**: BMI270 IMU with tilt detection, knock recognition, and orientation sensing
- **Connectivity**: USB-C OTG, RS485 terminal support, WiFi 6, Bluetooth 5.0
- **Power Management**: Solar charging compatibility with capacitor backup for emergency scenarios

## Key Systems
- **UI Manager**: Theme management, screen transitions, input handling, accessibility features
- **App Manager**: Modular application framework with lifecycle management and professional packaging
- **HAL Layer**: Hardware abstraction for display, touch, IMU, audio, storage, power, GPIO
- **Service Layer**: USB OTG, audio processing, storage management, mesh networking
- **Memory Manager**: PSRAM optimization for large applications (32MB utilization)
- **Potted Mode Manager**: Survival system with IMU-based navigation and power optimization
- **Meshcore Integration**: Advanced mesh networking with configurable GPIO profiles
- **System Settings**: Comprehensive configuration interface for all system components

## Applications (17+ Professional Apps)

### Core Productivity
- Contact Management with VCard support and advanced search
- Task Management with smart priorities and progress tracking
- Calendar with event scheduling and iCal support
- Alarm/Timer with multiple alarms and world clock
- File Manager with USB OTG and multi-storage support
- System Settings with comprehensive configuration options

### Entertainment & Games
- Droppin Blocks - Classic falling blocks puzzle game with scoring
- Solitaire - Klondike card game with smooth animations
- Sudoku - Number puzzle with multiple difficulty levels
- Basic Games Suite - Calculator, expense tracker, spreadsheet

### Development & Technical
- Enhanced Terminal with SSH, Telnet, and command history
- RS485 Terminal for industrial Modbus communication
- MicroPython Launcher with REPL and package management
- Meshcore App with advanced mesh networking and GPIO configuration

### Multimedia & Communication
- Camera application with photo/video capture and QR scanning
- Voice Recognition with ChatGPT integration
- RTL-SDR for software-defined radio operations
- Bluetooth Manager with device pairing and file transfer
- Mapping App with GPS and offline map support
- Meshtastic integration for LoRa mesh networking

### Educational & Reference
- Zim Reader - Offline Wikipedia with comprehensive search
- Reference library with offline knowledge base access

### Emergency & Survival
- Potted Mode system for end-of-world scenarios with touch-free operation
- Solar power optimization and emergency power management
- IMU-based navigation with tilt gestures and knock detection

## Build Commands
```bash
# Build project
pio run

# Upload to device
pio run --target upload

# Monitor serial output
pio device monitor

# Clean build
pio run --target clean

# Run tests
pio test
```

## Performance Optimization
- Memory-mapped PSRAM usage
- Function/data section optimization (-ffunction-sections, -fdata-sections)
- Dead code elimination (--gc-sections)
- LVGL GPU acceleration disabled for stability
- Custom memory management for large datasets

## Accessibility Features
- High contrast mode for visual impairment
- Voice feedback system (Talkback style)
- Talkback functionality for blind users
- Large touch targets and clear navigation
- IMU touch-free control with tilt-based cursor navigation
- Knock detection for gesture input without touching screen
- Potted Mode survival interface with minimal power consumption
- Voice command system for complete hands-free operation

## Development Notes
- Use `pio run` to build and test changes (120+ source files)
- Monitor memory usage with PSRAM_SIZE_MB=32 configuration
- LVGL 8.4 configuration in include/lv_conf.h with PPA acceleration
- All HAL interfaces designed for easy hardware abstraction
- Modular app architecture allows easy addition of new applications
- Professional app packaging system with .m5app format
- IMU HAL provides motion detection, tilt sensing, and knock recognition
- Potted Mode system for emergency scenarios and solar power operation
- Meshcore provides advanced mesh networking with configurable GPIO
- System Settings app centralizes all configuration options
- Docker-based app store server for professional app distribution

## New HAL Components
- **IMU HAL** (`src/hal/imu_hal.*`) - BMI270 6-axis sensor interface
- **Enhanced Power HAL** - Solar charging and emergency power management
- **GPIO Configuration** - Dynamic GPIO profile management for hardware flexibility

## New System Components  
- **Potted Mode Manager** (`src/system/potted_mode_manager.*`) - Survival system management
- **Enhanced OS Manager** - Integration of IMU and survival systems
- **Professional App Packaging** - .m5app format with Docker distribution
